story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_02:
Is this Darkrai’s nightmare? The one Cyrus
is experiencing?
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_03: I feel like I’ve lost something precious to me...
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_04:
If I knew I’d feel like this, I never would’ve
come here...
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_07: I know I have friends who care about me!
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_10:
Hey! You have to wake up! Everyone’s waiting
for you!
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_13:
Your ideals—your new galaxy! I’m sure this isn’t
what you wanted!
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_14: I wanna talk with you more, Cyrus!
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_15:
Maybe we won’t be able to understand everything
about each other...
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_16:
But how will we know if we haven’t even
tried yet?!
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_18: There are people here who need you!
story_teamgalactic_02_10000/2401_1201_19:
Stop running away into these nightmares, and
open your eyes!
